english.segment1: Maybelline Queens with plastic faces. Modeling their hips and their lips. Bleed yourselves again. 'cause your beauty is only skin deep. Following your cold surroundings.
english.segment2: It's all you have. Holding on. Holding on. To nothing. A hole you have. In your heart. It needs heart, it needs something
english.segment3: Wrapped up in your vanity. Put on your mask every morning. Scrape it off at the end of a long, long day
english.segment4: Maybelline Queens with plastic faces. Modeling their hips and their lips.
english.segment5: It's all you have. Holding on. Holding on. To nothing. A hole you have. In your heart. It needs heart, it needs something
